com.jcabi.email

Interface Envelope

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Envelope.Constant, Envelope.MIME, Envelope.Safe, Envelope.Strict

    @Immutable
public interface Envelope
    Envelope.

    The best way is to use Envelope.MIME, but you can easily create your own implementation of it.

    It is recommended to always wrap your envelope into Envelope.Safe.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@teamed.io)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Envelope.Constant
      Envelope that always returns the same message (within one hour).
      static class  Envelope.MIME
      Default envelope.
      static class  Envelope.Safe
      Safe envelope that adds missing parts to the message.
      static class  Envelope.Strict
      Strict envelope that fails if message is not valid.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Envelope EMPTY
      Empty (always returns an empty MIME message).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Message unwrap()
      Get a message out of it.

        Since:
